App: Name: Position: Experenice: Will you be Dedicated?: MSN/Email:
[IMG]http://i758.photobucket.com/albums/xx227/bigshnaz/2ymabdj-1.png[/img]
PvP Features -PK following (Ranged, Melee, Magic) -MANY new emotes added. (Including Vengeance, GS, All GS specs and crossbow attack emote.) -Teleports to many areas in wilderness -The vengeance GFX is 100% animated. -All Godsword and SS gfx are 100% animated. -Perfect PvP Wilderness levels -Fixed dark bow spec -NEAR Perfect Combat System -Rune crossbow emote
Player vs Monster Features -Godwars bosses 100% Like Runescape (see below) -100% Dagganoth kings with real like effects -Metal Dragons -Slayer monsters who give good drops -Kalphite Queen perfect like rs (see below) -King Black Dragon -Chaos Elemental
Skilling and Other Features -All Skills work -Slayer updated with player-monster task precision. -Home is Edgeville (changing soon) -Relatively fast training (300xp/hit) -Wonderful staff/Helpfull gameplay Staffs!!! -Money making can be a challenge. Find the right ways to be rich. -Characters show correct proportions in the equipment screen Much Much More Come And Find Out!
-Update Log- 8/25/10- Added Working Drops! 8/31/10- Added Webclient!

item.description:
@sriahciboon wrote:

Name: Aaron Geildorn
Position: Graphics Designer, and Coder (maby)
Experenice: Ive been using GIMP for 3+ years, and Ive recently switched to Photoshop a year ago. (Note: Im also taking Graphics courses at my highschool as a sophmore) Ive been coding for a while, but I would like to know what source type it is.
Will you be Dedicated?: Yes, I currently have school. But other than that I have much free time.
MSN/Email: Mexokisee@hotmail.com

A question for you: What source type is it? 317, 562, 602? Depending on what it is, I may Code.
